title: Gold Standard Evaluations
description: Comprehensive out-of-the-box evaluation criteria for 35+ different crops. Start collecting data on your first day.

title: Simple Trial Registration
description: Manually begin trials in the field on your mobile device or CSV upload large variety sets from your desktop.

title: GPS and Location Information
description: Automatically capture your location and instantly open maps by scanning QR code hot links.

title: Photo Capture
description: Seamlessly integrate photos and annotations into your evaluations. Multimedia are used to produce beautiful maps and reports.

title: Ultra Disconnected
description: No connection? No problem. Smart Crops data is securely collected and stored in an offline environment. Collect data anywhere, anytime.

title: Integrations & Workflow
description: Remote field sensors measuring temperature and moisture integrate directly into your iFormBuilder forms for accurate field conditions.
